SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
Board is the class that represents the board of the game

It contains the matrix of cells that represents the board, the set of items that are currently pending and the methods to manage them

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int[][] matrix)
      Constructs a new Board based on the provided matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix representing the board, where each value represents the circumstance of a cell. Use 0 for unusable, 2 for two players, etc.

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a new Board object. If the initial emptyBoard is not initialized, it loads the board matrix from a JSON file. The matrix represents the board: for every cell, the value represents the circumstance (0 for unusable, 2 for two players, etc.). The disposition of the board is then initialized based on the emptyBoard matrix, and pendingCells are set to an empty HashSet.

  • Method Details

    • setDisposition

      public void setDisposition(Cell[][] disposition)
      setDisposition is used to set, in every cell of the board, an item
      Parameters:
      disposition - : a matrix of Cell that need to be filled

    • setDisposition

      public void setDisposition(Object[][] JSONdisposition)
      Sets the disposition of the board based on the provided JSON representation.
      Parameters:
      JSONdisposition - The JSON representation of the board's disposition.

    • getDisposition

      public Cell[][] getDisposition()
      getDisposition is used to get the disposition of a certain cell from the board
      Returns:
      a matrix of cell

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(int x, int y)
      Retrieves the cell at the specified coordinates on the board. This method should only be used for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
      y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
      Returns:
      The cell at the specified coordinates.

    • setCell

      public void setCell(int x, int y, Item item, int circumstance)
      Sets the specified cell on the board with the given item and circumstance. This method should only be used for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
      y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
      item - The item to be set in the cell.
      circumstance - The circumstance value to be set for the cell.

    • setPendingCells

      public void setPendingCells(Set<Pair<Integer,Integer>> pendingCells)
      setPendingCells is used to set, in pendingCells, max 3 items
      Parameters:
      pendingCells - : a set of pair(items) that need to be set in pendingCells

    • getPendingCells

      public Set<Pair<Integer,Integer>> getPendingCells()
      getPendingCells is used to get a set of pair (x and y of a certain item) which are currently pending
      Returns:
      a set of pair(items)

    • select

      public int select(int x, int y)
      select is used to add in pendingCells an item
      Parameters:
      x - : row of the selected cell
      y - : column of the selected cell
      Returns:
      the current size (after select) of the set of items (pendingCells)

    • deselect

      public int deselect(int x, int y)
      deselect is used to eliminate an item from pendingCells
      Parameters:
      x - : row of the selected item
      y - : column of the selected item
      Returns:
      the current size (after deselect) of the set of items (pendingCells)

    • fill

      public void fill(int numPlayer, Bag bag)
      fill is used to fill, at the start of any game, all cells on the board
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - : indicates how many players play the game
      bag - : bag from where the items to be inserted in the cells of the board will be taken

    • removePendingItems

      public List<Item> removePendingItems()
      removePendingItems is used to clear the list of items which are currently pending
      Returns:
      a list of items that will be set in the shelf

    • needToRefill

      public boolean needToRefill()
      needToRefill is used to check if the board needs a refill
      Returns:
      true if every element of the board has 4 free sides, false if not

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      printBoard is used to print the board at any time

    • clone

      public Board clone()
      Creates and returns a clone of the board.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      A clone of the board, with the same cell circumstances and item contents.

    • sendToString

      public String sendToString()
      sendToString is used to have a representation of the board as a string
      Returns:
      The string representation of the send board, showing the items and their variants.

    • pendingToString

      public String pendingToString()
      pendingToString is used to have a representation of pending cells ad a string
